posts.title: 代码测试
posts.excerpt: 字符串匹配的问题，测试一下摘要
posts.text: 字符串匹配的问题，测试一下摘要 删掉重复元素 力扣26、80，只用下标记录未重复元素 123456789public int removeDuplicates(int[] nums) { int count = 0; for(int x : nums){ if(count < 2 || nums[count - 2] != x){ nums[count++] = x; } } return count; } 字符串匹配（暴力法） 123456789101112131415161718public int strStr(String haystack, String needle) { char[] hh = haystack.toCharArray(), nn = needle.toCharArray(); int m = hh.length, n = nn.length, i = 0, j = 0; while(i < m && j < n){ if(hh[i] == nn[j]){ ++i; ++j; }else{ i -= j-1; j = 0; } } if(j == n){ return i - j; }else{ return -1; } }

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
